Synthesis of Inorganic Particles

Preparation of UiO-66-NH2 

ZrCl4 (0.52g) and H2BDC-NH2 (0.17g) were dissolved in a mixed solution of DMF (8 mL) and formic acid (0.8 mL) by sonication. Then, the mixture was kept static standing at 120 °C for 24 h inside a 25 mL autoclave. The obtained precipitate was collected by centrifugation and washed with DMF and methanol 3 times, respectively. Thereafter, the crystals were further immersed in methanol for 2 days for the solution exchange. After being dried under reduced pressure for 12 h at 80 °C, UiO-66-NH2 was obtained. The preparation scheme was illustrated in A.
